EmailTemplate.name: SM-2019-02-Container Platforms - Thank You.EMAIL-Thank You
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Gift Card for Completing the Licensing & Compliance Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-vmware-ela/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4fVAAQ]]> <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-vmware-ela/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4fVAAQ]]> HiÂ {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for completing our Container Platforms Survey, your insight is greatly appreciated! As a reward for your time, your $10 gift card is enclosed below.
Based on your responses I think you might also like this on-demand webinar, Benchmarking Container Adoption in 2019 <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/on-demand-webinars/webinar-benchmarking-container-adoption-in-2019]]>. In 30-minutes, you will learn:
- Emerging trends - Why the built in knobs are limited - How you can overcome the roadblocks in managing containers across multiple clouds
Regards, Megan
{{my.Gift 10:default=edit me}}
